Topic.Title: Buying $100,000 Worth Of Apple - Good Or Bad Idea?

Message.Msg: Still some weakness in the stock, Volume wise. Value_Play gave an excellent viewpoint about the market going on nothing right now. Aapl is a broken stock right now, following the 'Miss' from last week. It could drop back down, but I would not see a radical drop to 550. It has taken a 4.75% drop since Earnings Report (and recovered over 1/3 of that since.) As I see it, watch it for a while....see how the Market goes Monday....keep an eye on SPX if it is holding levels from Friday. If you see a drop back into the range of 575-580, start watching closer. A drop back into the 550's is a 29 Point drop, and I just do not see that. Still plenty of upside here. Keep in mind the Ex-dividend effect will come into play....prices tend to run up to Ex-dividend, so your window of time is more narrow. Due to your experience level, I would urge you to consult with your broker as well. You are committing a serious amount of an investment. Now in conclusion, after you have bought in, and the stock drops (happens to the best of us...lol) do not be too concerned. Aapl may trade sideways for a while, but the future bodes well for the company, and the stock. You will be rewarded. Get professional advice...not a Message Board. Just an honest opinion all around..

Topic.Title: Fundamental research method

Message.Msg: Last week's big story was a stock market rally based upon heightened expectations of further stimulus from both the Fed and the ECB. So much for my expectation of a low volatility week! The calendar for this week includes plenty of important data and more earnings reports. Normally the Friday jobs report would be the most important news of the week. With last week's big three-day rally in mind, we must ask: Are we expecting too much from the Fed and the ECB?

Topic.Title: Buying $100,000 Worth Of Apple - Good Or Bad Idea?

Message.Msg: Don't buy it all at once. Buy on dips. Someone showed that even through the great depression if you bought 50 dollars every month for three years you would have still came out on top as opposed to buying in the beginning all at once. If you use this as a mantra you will come out on top. Hence why buffet prefers dividend stocks.

Message.Title: True story..in the 1960's the NYPD arrested a bookie
Message.Msg: and noticed his biggest client was a bank employee. The person was gambling tenfold his salary. So they put a undercover bank expert in his office to catch him. After weeks. they gave up. The NYPD and bank could not figure out what he was doing so they called him in. He confessed. He was depositing in his own account the the tenth of a sent or thousandth of a dollar. He figured no one would miss it and he was right. So, this is why I choose to highlight the small returns...below50% bu discussing the Jan call spreads far below the market prices

Topic.Title: True story..in the 1960's the NYPD arrested a bookie

Message.Title: Read and Weep Shorties!
Message.Msg: ...BERLIN (Reuters) - German Chancellor Angela Merkel and Italian Prime Minister Mario Monti will do everything to protect the euro zone and swiftly implement measures agreed by European leaders in June, their governments said in a statement on Sunday. The wording of the statement, issued after the pair discussed the euro zone crisis in a phone call on Saturday, echoed a pledge made by Merkel and French President Francois Hollande on Friday and the European Central Bank (ECB) President Mario Draghi on Thursday. European leaders have gone on the offensive in recent days, underlining their commitment to tackling the euro zone's crippling debt problems and seeking to restore calm after a week in which Spanish bond yields hit euro-era highs and Greece raised concern it would be unable to honour its bailout conditions and could exit the euro. Draghi's comments were read by markets as an indication the ECB may revive its programme of buying bonds of troubled governments on the secondary market.

Topic.Title: What happened to earnings big miss and lower guidance?

Message.Msg: AAPL did not miss, the analysts missed. AAPL beat guidance. If I were Chinese, I would wait for a chinese-speaking phone too. that phone is iPHONE5. And if I were European, I would wait to see if I was going to be in a depression before buying. And if I was not upper middle class or higher, I would not buy iPAD but wait for iPADmini. This "miss" seems like just cyclical issues to me....and, if you back out the $117 billion in cash, what is the current P/E of AAPL shares? Priced for very little growth, when they actually are growing 20% YOY. That is great growth for a company as SMALL as AAPL ;-) And all this during a down part of the iPHONE cycle??? Hmmm, I'd say the future is bright for these guys. And that is not even figuring in the iTV, should it appear. What do you think?

Topic.Title: Futures are Very Green, my Friends

Message.Msg: I'll be prerty surprised if the mkt goes green before the fed, who I believe will not make any QE move this wed., especially knowing the ECB will nearly certainly turn on the $ printing presses... QE will happen again, but I doubt it's iminent. This is just my sense from seeing this same scenario time and time again. I sold everything AAPL into strength last friday planning to buy back in cheaper, and I think that chance will come along a few times in the next few trading sessions. Regardless of direction, I'll be scaling in and out of positions until I either decide if going for the div is worth more than trading... But I am sure come Sept, AAPL will begin going parabolic again into January, as long as the new iPhone looks like a winner. Playing it a little cautiously with interval positioning seems like the wisest way of things for awhile. GLTA🌴🌴🌴

Topic.Title: COMPETITION IN PHONES WITH FALLING SALES = WON'T HOLD 50 DAY & WILL TEST 200 DAY MA

Message.Msg: Very possible. Remember though Samdung sells alot of different models of phones, and that number encompasses all units of cellphones, not just smartphones. When the new iPhone comes out, it is very likely that Apple will regain the #1 spot holding close to 6 months into it from release, where then people will stop buying and start waiting for the next new iPhone, just like now. As far as tablets, when the iPad mini comes out, Apple will have the tablet mkt in game set match position. Yes there is alot of competition, but objectively, Apple still offers the best overall quality and experience, and that sells best. All that being said, Apple in my opinion is slowing down, mainly because of product cycle predictability. I do not believe any longer in AAPL $1000, but I do believe in AAPL $825-$850. And that will be pretty easy. From there it's anybody's guess. For now until iPhine 5 release I am going to play it very cautiously, using interval positioning strategy. Still plenty of cash to be made on the bulliish side of things until this upcoming January at the very least. AAPL has made me financially secure for life, and both the stock and Apple products are simply fantastic and will very likely continue to be for a good while yet. GLTA🌴🌴🌴

Topic.Title: NEW MAC ADS = HOME RUN ADVERTISING CAMPAIGN -- OFFERING APPS. WITH GOOD HUMOR!!!

Message.Msg: I believe the "effectiveness" of any ad has the following litmus test: Does the message conveyed "resonate"? res·o·nate (rz-nt) v. res·o·nat·ed, res·o·nat·ing, res·o·nates v.intr. 1. To exhibit or produce resonance or resonant effects. 2. To evoke a feeling of shared emotion or belief: "It is a demonology [that] seems to resonate among secular and religious voters alike" (Tamar Jacoby). 3. To correspond closely or harmoniously: "Symbolism matters, especially if the symbols resonate with the larger message" (William Greider). v.tr. To cause to resound. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ All 3 ads "resonate" very well among the APPLE LOYAL CUSTOMERS... I came away with the following: There's a MAC....and then there are other sucker-tablets that lack Apps. to do a lot of things. This gives a lot of "VALUE" to the MAC and the APP STORE and the APPLE BRAND. INVEST in AAPL for the LONG-TERM!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Yes it is common sense that if the iPhone 5 is not so great, then Apple will tank. I do not believe for a second that those pics are representative of the REAL iPhone coming out in Oct. No matter what happens though, Q4 and Q1 will be stellar, and to me that's all the time in the world to make yet another killing, even if it's the last. We'll see... iPads are going to be the overwhelming winner along with the iPad mini, and nobody is going to ever be able to beat Apple there. Could very well turn out the Tablets become the overall top earner for Apple, very possibly bringing in more cash than iPhones... not at all out of the realm of possibility as things appear to be shaping up. I know I plan to be cautious and will trade around the volatility, and will make plenty of money with Apple, most assuredly from Oct to January. From there, I'm out until the newest Iphone comes around. To me, that's the best play.

Topic.Title: ARTICLE -- 15 REASONS WHY APPLE IS A ONCE IN A LIFETIME OPPORTUNITY

Message.Msg: The author was referring to the APPLE BRAND....being "head and shoulders" above the rest. I believe the technical pattern of reference applicable to the AAPL chart is the Ascending Triangle...and it's textbook on the AAPL long-term monthly chart. The weak are folding and profit-taking consolidation is taking place.....as stronger hands trade places for the long-term push higher. With the added Dividend and Share Buyback and New Product Pipeline, APPLE will be the first Trillion Dollar Market Cap. with a price far exceeding $1,000 per share (pre- any future *splits). * I am a firm believer in share price management. APPLE should take page out of EXXON MOBIL's playback....as they split their shares with regularity. Like APPLE, EXXON MOBIL is very well-managed.

for real the stock price is what all here are interested in. That being the case the OCTOBER release is key in this way: 1. people are are intreagued and want to see if apple can do it yet again. they can't wait to see the new product and know it will be a revenue generator no matter what, but wait till it comes out to see for sure. 2. people believ in apple and don't want to miss the boat yet again. So the question is will the street frontrun the product launch or wait and see? well if the stock starts to rise fronrunning on te table, flat to down wait and see product. Buy the rumor sell the news, sell the rumor buy the news. seems simple if one can figure it out.....it has been a buy the rumor company so long is it time for a change, I think so, due to the current macro condition people aren't going to commit until the company delivers.....I will wait.

Topic.Title: PREDICTION: When is going to be a good time to buy before August 9 (Ex Dividend Date)?

Message.Msg: Watch the charts...it will run up to Ex-dividend...since this is the first one (in many years) it will happen probably late this week. Make sure you buy before the 9th. Just some advice. The sale has to be Posted to your account on the 9th, so the day before is key. That way you will have settled funds in your account by Record Date. Good luck, you will be fine.
